tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biodegradable_packaging_usage (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name STRING,
  usage_amount INT,
  usage_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE usage_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT,
  usage_date DATE,
  quantity_used INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES packaging_materials(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Packaging_Usage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  usage_date DATE,
  quantity_used INT
)

CREATE TABLE Packaging_Inventory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity_available INT
)

CREATE TABLE Packaging_Supplier (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Packaging_Log (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(255),
  action_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE biodegradable_materials_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    usage_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    usage_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE material_categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE product_packaging (
    packaging_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    packaging_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    packaging_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    material_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES biodegradable_materials_usage(id)
)

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    packaging_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE material_inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    available_quantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)
